name: Catch The Beat (beta) for Vive
description:
Get thrown on stage.  Then, get juggling pins thrown at your face.  A lot of them.  In complicated patterns choreographed to music.

But not to worry - these are VR pins, which means:

  • predictive annotations let you know where  you need to catch them
  • they're synced to music, letting you feel when you need to catch them
  • they don't hurt when you catch 'em
  • they don't hurt when you miss 'em

You'll flip into flow state and feel the hypnotic joy of juggling within minutes of play, instead of literally hours of painful practice with physical balls and pins.

Here's the most challenging routine in the game:

Featuring 3 original juggling routines, choreographed by Albert Hwang.

Featuring music from:

  • Elliott Larue
  • Jordan Woods-Robinson
  • Ken Urbina

Currently only supports Vive.  Jump on the mailing list for updates!
